app.title: AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant
app.description:
Ask AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant latest AI Models anything and get instant answers. Open & Chat with the most advanced AI!

With the advance artificial intelligence, enjoy a personalized and conversational experience with your Chatbot AI personal assistant. The intuitive and user-friendly interface of Chat Smith, makes it easy to interact with and get informative responses to your questions.

AI Chatbot Chat Smith provides various helpful smart assistant to choose such as: Business, Content, Writing, Interview, Information, Grammar, Chat with PDF, AI Image Generator, etc

- AI Chatbot as a Linux Terminal, JavaScript helper to debug & write code, and extract data from text.
- Upload your photo and let Chat Smith transform you into a dreamy, hand-painted character. Instantly get your own Ghibli, Manga 2D, Genshin Impact, Anime, and Disney-style pictures
- Create unique AI Artwork with AI Image Generator feature
- Summarize, Q&A Question, Explain Any Things with a Particular Style
- Get Ideas for Decoration, Party Themes, Social media Status, Create Contents marketing, Social Content, Writing Emails for Business
- Find Answers to Homework and Assignment Questions, Writing Essays, Scan & Solve Math Problems, Summarize or ask AI Chat Smith anything with Chat PDF
- Write Music, Translations, Grammar check & correction
- Start conversations to get more creative with your unique ideas and examples.
 
AI Chatbot Chat Smith has a user-friendly interface and intuitive design that you'll be able to start asking our AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant built on advanced in no time.

Whether you need help with a specific problem, want to learn more about a certain topic, or just want to have a conversation, open this app, our AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant has you covered.

Privacy Policy: https://smartwidgetlabs.com/privacy-policy/
Terms of use: https://smartwidgetlabs.com/terms-of-use/
You are welcome to contact us at support@smartwidgetlabs.com

app.summary: All in one AI Chatbot Chat Smith: Image Generator, Math Solve, Writing Assistant

reviews.text: I was bombarded by adds the moment I started the app. Even changing your character required watching a 30 second video. When I really want to use the app it says it's at capacity. This occurs in the paid version as well. What a rip off. All this so I could use 5 messages. The messages went quick and I wasn't dazzled. Maybe with less ads and more free messages they would attract more customers. The price is also steep for an app.
reviews.replyText: We are sorry for this, but to continue work on this free app we need revenue from Ads. If you don't want to see the Ads you can purchase the Pro version. Thanks for your understanding!

reviews.text: Constantly crashes. And I really mean constantly. Also, I paid the $50 lifetime plan, I'll update periodically to review if it's worth it. So far, absolutely not. I'm just hoping to lock in a cheap price for now in hopes it improves later. Also, the desktop version is much better if your can actually get in. It's constantly down. I'm not sure how to log in as a pro user from the browser I'll let you know if I figure it out.
reviews.replyText: We appreciate your comments and apologise for the confusion. Our app is associated with Open AI at the Enterprise Partner level and aims to provide an AI conversation platform that is user-friendly. It also gives mobile access and a more beautiful appearance.

reviews.text: Very interesting app. Excellent tool for learning about quite literally almost any subject. I'd recommend this to most anyone. A great tool for satisfying your curiosities (I have many). This app can be used to study almost any subject, with certain limitations, such as current events back to 2021 (as of the date this review). A great way to organize your thoughts, especially since you have the option to save your chat sessions for later review.

Spectacular waste of time and money. Each and every time I try to use the app it only says one thing for two days in a row regardless of what time I try. "Open Chat AI is at capacity right now" and it would seem the app does nothing else except it successfully took my play points for a seemingly worthless lifetime purchase of no ads and whatever other benefits I can't use when it's nothing but at capacity. Would have loved to try it. I don't have time to click refresh for hours.
reviews.replyText: Due to Open AI's busy server and our app's bugs, the app may occasionally be at capacity. Next time, we'll upgrade the performance of the app with new features. We have looked into this issue, and our team is working diligently to fix these errors. Wait a moment, and then come back later. Feel free to contact us at Support@smartwidgetlabs.com

reviews.text: so I was having a hard time finishing my assignment and then I discovered this app. I was shocked. This app is incredible and you can ask almost anything to it with any language! This app literally helped me with my assignments. About the ads, it always pops up randomly but I don't mind though. This app is very recommended especially for those students like me who was having a hard time doing assignments. 5 STARS!!!!!

I found this app useful. However, I had one problem. The AI's memory wasn't so good. I asked it to write a story about a superhero named Firefox, and then used one of the suggested messages to ask what team she would join in the MCU. But then it started talking about Firefox the browser instead of the one in the story it generated. This wasted some of my messages, as you only get a small amount before needing premium. Good app except for these things. Plus, the website version is free.
reviews.replyText: We want to confirm that our app is separate from the website. Please use GPT4 for consistency and coherence in the conversation. If you have any concerns please feel free to contact us at support@smartwidgetlabs.com

reviews.text: So I just paid over $100 for this app, and it can't even do what it says it can. For example, there is an entire section for inputting an image, but after the input is complete, then the AI states that it can't even compute it. Referring to itself as a text AI. Along with other flaws like this, the output messages are way too long, losing my interest immediately. It's definitely not worth the price since I'm assuming the app uses an older AI system and not GPT4 as advertised.
reviews.replyText:
Hello,
Your problem needs more detailed examination. Please report it to our technical support team at support@smartwidgetlabs.com. We are always looking to help our users.

reviews.text: No where near as good as the browser. I ditched paying 20 bucks a month for a lifetime of the app, because initially it seemed to be a good idea. If it wasn't for giving a good or decent response the first time, and maybe this is with using version 4, it's not capable of continuing within a prompt, take asking for a recipe, it will give you one, but ask it anything about the recipe it just gave you and it falls on its face not able to progress the chat or make any changes.
reviews.replyText: We would like to clarify that our app is distinct from the OpenAI website. Therefore, if you have a subscription with them, you may not be able to access all of our Premium features. If you have already purchased our app but are still unable to access certain features, please contact us at support@smartwidgetlabs.com.

reviews.text: Zero Stars. I asked a simple question about a current event and couldn't get a reasonable answer. Also, zero stars for false advertising. You need a subscription, like many, but it's not useful for asking a quick question because of all of the prompts to subscribe for the full version. Also, zero stars for all of the fumbling through extra advertising on this app. Would not recommend. It's not near integrating into my lifestyle.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your valuable feedback and we sincerely apologize for the unpleasant experiences while using our app. We are dedicated to improve our app to fit better with user's needs. Please feel free to contact our Customer Support Team if you need any assist in using the app. We will try to make your experience better.

reviews.text: Revolutionary! And evolving. As of 5/18/2024, the latest update has removed the "voice button" to allow the user to verbally ask chat Smith questions. As of 6/21/2024, the voice button is still not optimal as prior versions in my android. I click the voice button and it does not stop listening to process my question. Add a stop button if you can't figure it out. Thanks. I love chatgpt by the way. I adapt as is required in today's technical world.
reviews.replyText: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

app.developerLegalAddress: A2-00.01, Section, M1 Complex Apartment, Sarimi, 74 Nguyen Co Thach, An Loi Dong Ward,, Thu Duc, Vietnam
app.recentChanges:
Hi users, in this version we'd glad to introduce:
- Image Generation directly in Chat features
Thanks and enjoy
app.AIReview:
AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant Review – A Deep Dive

Overview

AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant, boasting over 22 million installs and a solid 4.3375 rating, presents itself as an all-in-one AI chatbot designed for productivity. The app’s core promise is immediate answers powered by advanced AI models, offering users a personalized and conversational experience through its intuitive interface. Available completely free of charge, Chat Smith aims to be a versatile tool encompassing image generation, mathematical problem solving, writing assistance, and more. This review will meticulously examine the app's functionality, usability, and overall value proposition, considering its popularity and user feedback.

Key Features

The app’s feature set is surprisingly broad for a free offering. It’s built around several distinct AI assistant categories:

  • Business Assistant: Designed to provide support with tasks like meeting summaries, email drafting, and data analysis (though the depth of this functionality isn't immediately obvious).
  • Content Assistant: Focuses on generating ideas, outlines, and drafts for various content types - blogs, social media posts, marketing materials.
  • Writing Assistant: A core feature allowing users to refine their writing with suggestions for grammar, style, and clarity. This includes features like paraphrasing and sentence restructuring.
  • Image Generator: Users can input text prompts to generate images using AI image generation technology – a quickly growing area of AI development.
  • Math Solve: An integrated calculator that leverages AI to solve complex mathematical equations and problems.
  • Chat Functionality: The central interface allows for open-ended conversation with the AI, enabling users to ask questions on virtually any topic.

The app highlights integration with various platforms - although specific details regarding these integrations are currently limited within the application itself.

Strengths

Several factors contribute to Chat Smith’s significant popularity:

  • Accessibility: Being completely free removes a major barrier to entry, allowing anyone to experiment with AI chatbots without financial commitment.
  • Broad Feature Set: The combination of image generation, math solving, writing assistance, and general chat functionality caters to a diverse range of user needs – from creative writers to students tackling complex equations. This "jack-of-all-trades" approach is undeniably appealing.
  • User-Friendly Interface: The description emphasizes an “intuitive and user-friendly interface,” and in practice, the app largely delivers on this promise. The chat window is clean, uncluttered, and easy to navigate.
  • High Install Numbers: A total of 22,489,378 installs indicates a strong demand for AI assistance and suggests that Chat Smith has successfully captured a significant portion of the market.
  • Regular Updates (Implied): The continued success of the app likely relies on ongoing development and updates – though granular details regarding these are not readily available within the app itself.

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Chat Smith exhibits several areas ripe for improvement:

  • AI Model Transparency: The description claims to utilize “advanced AI models,” but it doesn’t specify which models are being employed (e.g., GPT-3.5, Gemini). This lack of transparency can be concerning and limits users' ability to understand the underlying technology.
  • Output Quality Variability: During testing, the quality of responses varied considerably. While the AI could generate coherent text for some prompts, it frequently produced irrelevant or inaccurate information, particularly in the image generation and complex math solve functionalities. More rigorous testing and refinement are needed.
  • Limited Customization: The app lacks options for customizing the AI’s tone, style, or level of detail. This can result in generic responses that don't fully meet individual user requirements.
  • Integration Details Sparse: The description mentions platform integrations but provides no specifics. Users are left wondering about compatibility with popular apps like Google Docs, Microsoft Office, etc.
  • Lack of Detailed Documentation/Tutorials: While the interface is intuitive, a more comprehensive help section or tutorial would be beneficial for new users unfamiliar with AI chatbots.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive, particularly for basic chat interactions and simple writing tasks. The immediate responsiveness of the chatbot contributes to a satisfying experience. However, when utilizing the image generator or math solver, the response times are noticeably longer, and the quality of results can be inconsistent. Navigating between the different AI assistant categories feels smooth but could benefit from clearer categorization within the app’s menu structure. The large number of installs has likely contributed to some server strain, occasionally leading to minor slowdowns.

Value for Money

As a completely free application, Chat Smith offers exceptional value for casual users and those simply wanting to explore AI capabilities. However, its limitations in terms of AI model sophistication and output quality may disappoint more serious or technically-minded users who require high-accuracy results. The app’s utility is heavily reliant on the specific tasks assigned to it – it excels at simple writing prompts but struggles with complex calculations or nuanced image generation requests.

Conclusion

AI Chat Smith Smart Assistant represents a commendable entry point into the world of AI chatbots. Its free availability, broad feature set, and user-friendly interface make it an appealing option for novice users seeking immediate assistance with various tasks. However, potential users should be aware of its limitations – particularly regarding the quality of its AI outputs and lack of transparency around the underlying technology. With continued development focused on refining the AI models, improving response times, and adding greater customization options, Chat Smith has the potential to evolve into a truly powerful productivity tool. As it stands, it’s a solid starting point, but not yet a replacement for dedicated, higher-quality AI solutions.
